detaileddescription.para: This macro indicates the delay required for BMI160_ACCEL while switching from Suspend/low power mode to normal mode
macro used to enable the interrupt variable to check initialization status
This macro indicates the delay required for BMI160_GYRO while switching from Suspend mode to normal mode

briefdescription.para: Function to initialize bmi160.This needs to be called before calling any other API.

parameterdescription.para: :callback that will be called in deferred context when an registered interrupt occurs
when any of the input parameter(bmi160Info or bmi160Info->ISRCallback) is NULL.
when any of the input parameter for BST library API is NULL.
when error is returned from BST library API.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Enable or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Init API's.
1) The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).
2) The support of multiple instances is not possible due to the limitation in the BST library.
3) Calling Bmi160 initialization API present in sensorUtils (Bmi160Utils_initialize) and BST library (bmi160_init) concurrently will lead to unexpected behaviour.

briefdescription.para: Function to read remapped bmi160 data .

parameterdescription.para: :structure to hold the remapped bmi160 data
when any of the input parameter is NULL.
when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer AxisRemap_remapSensorData API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

inbodydescription.para: copying the actual sensor data into a local variable

briefdescription.para: Function to uninitialize bmi160.After calling this API sensor is no more usable without initializing it again by calling initialize API.

parameterdescription.para: when this api is called before initializing Bma280 sensor.

simplesect.para: In case of other failures refer BSP_SensorNode_Disable or BSP_SensorNode_IsAllNodesDisabled or #I2CSensorTransceiver_Deinit API.
The return value consist of (First MSB Byte represents Package ID,Next Byte represents Severity and Last 2LSB Bytes represents error code).

briefdescription.para: This function maps error codes returned from BMI160 library to retcode values.

parameterdescription.para: BMI160 sensor API call failed because of invalid input parameter
